title: Bradbury-Sullivan LGBT Community Center
description: Bradbury-Sullivan LGBT Community Center provides a vibrant, inclusive space in Pennsylvania's Lehigh Valley for all of the region's LGBTQ+ residents. It offers community programming, addressing barriers to care through its health programs, organizes annual Pride festival and works towards increasing equity through its LGBTQ+ Education Institute.
address: 522 W Maple St, Allentown, PA 18101, USA
